reviews.review: A very fun game to play with friends and to waste some spare time. However the community is pretty toxic and you will eventually run into someone who'll express their hatred towards you. Other than that this game is pretty cool and I enjoy it a lot!
no
Dead by daylight is one of the video games of all time.

Fun game, great premise. A few small annoyances, namely the way the Rift (battle pass) encourages not playing to the best of your ability to get objectives done, and the strange profanity filter that is irremovable despite the fact that this is a game about brutally murdering people. But yeah, I can easily see myself putting many more hours into this.

shii the game is good but sometimes you will shit ya pants!
Not worth it

The first few hours are the most special, they get you hooked (pun intended) It's scary and fun. Id give a positive review only for that first contact... However the more deep you go into the competitive side, the worse it gets.

Devs have the impossible task to try and balance an assymetric game, there will always be loopholes. And don't get me started on their "ranked" matchmaking.

The game has a cult following that will rabidly defend it, be warned that the community is very toxic. Yes there are the good ones out there, but eating candy out of a sh*t bucket doesn't make it taste any better.

If you really want it, play for a few hours and dont bother going into Twitch or Youtube "to learn the game" it will just ruin it.
Jason main here, Im from dead by daylight

This used to be one of those games you'd always come back to. The constant stream of new characters, perks
and maps meant that whenever you came back, there'd be a bunch of new things to play around with. 
After they added their new matchmaking system, the variety of perks that you'd come across in games slowly decreased to the point where you see nearly everyone run the same exact build.

The entire playstyle changed from a fun casual game, to some unwanted competitive game. It's no longer about messing around with perks and seeing them in action. It's about speedrunning the objectives "in the most efficient way possible" just so some invisible number rises behind the scenes. Toxicity has also skyrocketed heavily since. It seems like both sides genuinely seem to hate each other. I'm not saying toxicity never existed before, but it's way more prevalent now.

They have definitely made a bunch of good changes too but they're almost meaningless due to the effects that came from skill based matchmaking.
It's alright, a little pricey with the DLC's if youre there from the start (like me), but overall the devs are trying at least and its not dead like other games. Love the new prestige update

Developers haven't bothered to make a build for Linux, so the game is not playable on the steam deck.

There are also a lot of issues with the gameplay and a lot of mechanics that are outright not fun to play against. This game has tremendous potential for exciting gameplay with its perk system, but the developers put their focus in the wrong direction doing their best to squash fun.

O jogo é bom! eu me divirto e gosto bastante, recomendo para quem quiser jogar com amigos. Mas algumas mecânicas do jogo deveriam existir para a melhoria do jogo, como:  Assim como os killers tem uma habilidade e poder único, é por isso que eles unicos e gostamos deles. cada sobrevivente deveria ter uma habilidade única, sinceramente os sobreviventes serem a mesma coisa é bem chato.
A unica diferença deles é a skin, jogar com david e jogar com a mikaela, em questão de mecânica não tem diferença nenhuma. você pode usar os mesmos perks, então acho bem clichê e ultrapasso cada sobrevivente  TER uma habilidade... e mesmo assim esse jogo não tem!
Se cada personagem tivesse uma habilidade diferente,  ai sim ficaria bem mais interessante, por isso não paramos de jogar  League of Legends.

Provavelmente você vai upar todos os seus personagens pro level 40 e jogar apenas com 1 personagem que goste, porque o resto deles não faz nenhuma diferença mecânica e sim visual...

Fora esses desastre óbvio e simples mas a empresa não fez porque não sei ... o jogo é legal.

La eterna lucha entre survs y killers. Si eres de México y apenas vas iniciando a jugar como killer juega en la tarde,ya que en la noche salen las premades tryhard y son mas complicadas las partidas. Si quieres mejorar como killer juega en la noche. Y tú juega como se te dé la gana mi pa´, ignora las reglas imaginarias que ponen los surv. llorones. Y por ultimo y mas importante: relajate, es un juego. ´PD: compren al buba,campeen y tuneleen por placer, para ver arder al mundo. Chaito

Overall the game is really great. 

A few downsides include (1) it is extremely audio based so if you are deaf this game may not be the best for you (2) this is a very violent game so I do not recommend it for children and (3) it also requires the players to have a distinct level of dexterity meaning this game may not be the best for someone who has motor function issues.

Enjoyable with friends (got none, or those are not gaming anymore).
Otherwise, the most toxic game out there, even beating CoD etc.
The worst is actually survivor 2-stacks griefing other survivors by body blocking them or giving your location away to the killer.

すごく楽しいゲームです。キャラがこわく(グロく)ないのでこわいのが苦手でも大丈夫。
最初はパークやアイテムなどそろってないのと、なれてないとで私はぜんぜん勝てなかったです。(今も勝てないけど…。)
ゲームセンスそうとうないと、最初は負けてばかりだと思いますが(私みたいに)、諦めなければすぐに楽しく遊べるようになりますよ。たぶん…。
それに負けてもやみつきデッドバイデイライト！！(わたしこのゲームから何も貰ってないです！ｗ)
ゲーム最近は全然やってなかった私の一押しゲームです。
新キラー少しこわいよ。２２．６．９ロッカーキャッチかなりビビりました。
